attachments.text: Thomas Byttebier is a freelance web designer creating minimalist and easy to use websites and user interfaces. Thomas lives and works in Gent, Belgium.

text: it's funny that he brings up the core reason behind iconography - the need for a language-nutreal way of explaining a concept, especially in a size constrained areas - but does not explain how we're to make copy work in this context
